content: **gingerbread tree & christmas tree ornaments** is an original crochet pattern by june gilbank chunky and flat just like the edible cookie version the gingerbread tree ornament is a perfect blank canvas for decorating with beads embroidery or whatever crafty icing you like or make the christmas tree version in green or white with a brown trunk both versions are crocheted amigurumi-style in a continuous spiral from only 10 yds of yarn with no sewing so the pattern works up quickly with minimal finishing **yarn ** small quantity of worsted weight yarn in a gingerbread shade or green or white and brown **hook ** us e / 3 5mm **size ** approx 3 5 9cm tall your gauge and yarn choice will affect the finished size slightly note this pattern is donationware - the pattern is available for free but if you like it please consider sending me a donation to show your appreciation the pdf version available for any size donation is formatted for easy viewing and printing and includes bonuses a 2-page guide to the embroidery and embellishments used on the sample trees and additional info and left-handed photos the complete pattern is available to view in full for no charge from the linked page *** > ***please join us*** *in the planetjune crochet designs > group http //www ravelry com/groups/planetjune-crochet-designs > - you can get pattern support join crochet-alongs show off your fos > suggest new designs and chat all > welcome *
